name: Ed, Edd n Eddy: The Mis-Edventures
name_original: Ed, Edd n Eddy: The Mis-Edventures
description: Ed, Edd n Eddy: The Mis-Edventures is a 3D platform game based on the Cartoon Network animated television series Ed, Edd n Eddy. It was developed by Artificial Mind and Movement and Cartoon Network Interactive, published by Midway Games and released on November 3, 2005, for the PlayStation 2, Nintendo GameCube, Xbox, Game Boy Advance, and Microsoft Windows. Midway announced the game on February 15, 2005.
